abstract: There are plenty of reasons to be doubtful about recent speculation that AT&T might buy EchoStar, which runs the Dish satellite-television network. For one thing, some believe that, for tax reasons, this month’s spinoff of EchoStar’s technology and infrastructure assets puts a two-year kibosh on any EchoStar takeout. Others look to recent sales of EchoStar stock by the company’s executives as a bearish signal.
